summary:
Experience in auditing international companies:

Conducted audits for companies under IFRS, US GAAP and other accounting standards, ensuring compliance with accounting regulations and standards.
Gained extensive knowledge of financial reporting and analysis, risk management, and internal controls.
Collaborated with clients to identify and address financial issues, providing recommendations for improvement.

Consulting and advisory skills:

Advised clients on ways to increase efficiency and improve financial performance.
Assisted clients in creating and transforming financial statements, including budgeting and forecasting.
Developed and maintained strong client relationships through effective communication and negotiation skills.

Team leadership and management:

Managed teams of up to 15 associates, ensuring timely completion of projects while maintaining high-quality work standards.
Demonstrated effective leadership skills, including coaching and mentoring team members, providing constructive feedback, and fostering a positive work environment.
Developed and implemented training programs for team members, ensuring ongoing professional development.

Business acumen and operations expertise:

Developed a deep understanding of finance, business, and operations, enabling effective communication with top management, clients, and teams.
Connected the dots between different areas of the business to provide insights and recommendations that drove business performance.

Overall, a broad range of skills and experience that enable to provide valuable insights to clients, lead teams effectively, and drive business performance.
